Text: Ken I know the last couple of weeks have been hell but I want to remind you and Linda that your friends are in your corner Whatever happens with Enron it is a great company and you built it from the ground up Allot of investors including Nancy and me made money on the stock in the past and if some of the money has to be given back so be it Thats the system The good deeds of Linda Enron and you will be remembered longer than the problems of the last or months Good luck Jack
